product_name: The North Face Zephyrus Pro Hoodie - Women's
long_description: Ideal for alpine climbing and mountaineering, The North Face Zephyrus Pro women's hoodie incorporates PrimaLoft(R) insulation in special ZLoft(TM) baffles for an great warmth-to-weight ratio. PrimaLoft(R) One is a patented ultrafine microfiber blend that offers downlike softness, and is incredibly lightweight and water repellent. ZLoft technology integrates strips of PrimaLoft One into a Z-baffle construction, which eliminates the cold-leaking stitching holes found in conventional baffles. Hood and shoulders have a polyurethane coating to increase water resistance. Harness- and pack-friendly handwarmer pockets; zippered Napoleon pocket. Hidden hem cinch-cord at center front zip. The North Face Zephyrus Pro hoodie for women insulated with PrimaLoft One keeps you warm even when wet.
short_description: Ideal for alpine climbing and mountaineering, The North Face Zephyrus Pro women's hoodie incorporates PrimaLoft(R) insulation in special ZLoft(TM) baffles for an great warmth-to-weight ratio.
